open.title: Evotel outage | Gauteng
open.description: Evotel has informed us of a network outage affecting Gauteng, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Evotel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel outage | Gauteng
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Gauteng, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Netstream | Gauteng
open.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity affecting Netstream clients in Johannesburg, affected clients will experience no connectivity. We are working with Netstream and partners to resolve the issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Metrofibre Outage | Broadacres

open.title: Octotel Maintenance | Vredehoek
open.description: Octotel is conducting maintenance in Vredehoek from Tuesday, 28th February 2023 to Thursday, 2nd March 2023 between 00:00 and 06:00, users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Octotel Maintenance | Sea Point

closed.title: Octotel outage | Cape Town
closed.description: Octotel has informed us of a network outage affecting a number of nodes in Cape town, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Octotel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: The Gape Gate node has been restored however there is still a risk of an outage while Octotel technicians attend to a fibre break.
